text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y540 81SX0004US Gaming Laptop - 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 256 GB SSD, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-bit is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the Lenovo Legion Y540 81SX0004US Gaming Laptop - 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 256 GB SSD, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y540 81SX0004US Gaming Laptop - 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 256 GB SSD, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-bit is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
